duel.title: Duel with Friend
duel.description: Each round, after a random amount of time, the button will turn green. If you click it when it's green before your opponent, you get the point. However, if you click early, you lose a point. After a click is made, the next round starts immediately.

multiplayer.title: Play with Friend
multiplayer.description: Send a link to your friend to challenge them to a standard game of chess.

singleplayer.title: Play against Computer
singleplayer.description: Play a game of chess against a questionable AI.

minesweeper.title: Minesweeper
minesweeper.description: Click on a square and hope it's not a mine! Revealed squares will indicate the number of mined squares directly adjacent or diagonal to it. Can you scout the entire grid without stepping on a mine?

singleplayer.title: Singleplayer
singleplayer.description: Play a solo game of minesweeper.

multiplayer.title: Multiplayer
multiplayer.description: Play minesweeper with friends. If one of you reveals a mine, they're eliminated!

race.title: Race
race.description: Race your friends on an identical board to see who can clear it first. Speedy or cautious?
